GSP29vytrkt3u:4148_0: tathā cānupalambha eva doṣo 3 tu hetvasatvamityarthaḥ / asminnapi mate viruddhopyavyāptyantarbhūta

GSP29vytrkt3u:4148_7: tatrāha -- api ceti // tataścāvyāptireva doṣatvena kḷptatvādudbhāvyeti bhāvenāha -- kḷptaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:4158: nanvevaṃ cetkevalavyatirekiviṣayāpattirityata uktaṃ -- asādhāraṇanyāyeneti// tatraiccodyasamādhānāditi bhāvaḥ//

GSP29vytrkt3u:4160: vaktavyatvāt/ api cānukūlatarkāvatāradaśāyāmapi sapakṣavipakṣayorliṅga 3 jñānasya satvena tadāpyanumitipratibandhakatayā doṣatvāpātādityabhipretyāha -- iti digiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4168_1: iti 1 hetvābhāsāḥ / tatrā 2 siddhaviruddhau asiddhaprabhedaśca pūrvoktarītyaiva /
GSP29vytrkt3u:4168_4: sapratipakṣaḥ / sa eva viruddhavyabhicārītyucyate / svaparapakṣasiddhāvapi trirūpo hetuḥ

GSP29vytrkt3u:4172_5: yathā vimataṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt śaktirūpyavat- vimataṃ -

GSP29vytrkt3u:4183: satya dṛśyatvāt brahmavaditi// pakṣadvaye trirūpatvaṃ ca pratipakṣe 5 tulyatvamivābhimānikam/ ato nāsaṃbhava ityuktaṃ prāk//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4187_1: kalpyantām / bahudhā ca nirucyāntām / tathāpi te sarve na tāvatpakṣadharmatāvighaṭanarūpāḥ /
GSP29vytrkt3u:4190: śrotrṛbuddhisaukaryāyoktasya sarvasya niṣkṛṣṭamarthamāha -- ayamatreti// caturvidhā hi vādibhirucyamānāḥ sambhavanti
GSP29vytrkt3u:4194: vyāptivirahahetubhūtā veti hṛdi nidhāya krameṇāha -- na tāvadityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4200_0: nāpi 1 tadvighaṭakāḥ / tvatpakṣe siddhasādhanavadasiddhyunnāyakatvena svato doṣatvāyogāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:4201_0: kiṃ ca savyabhicāraviruddhānadhyavasiteṣu na tāvadavyāptirnāstīti yuktam / teṣu pakṣadharmatāyāḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:4201_1: satvena hetorābhāsatvāyogāt / nāpyavyāpteḥ satve 'pi tadajñā 2 ne 'pi anyajñānādevānumānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:4201_2: duṣṭamiti vācyam / anyasyānumānāvirodhitve doṣatvāyāgāt / virodhitvamapi na tāvatsākṣātphalavighaṭa
GSP29vytrkt3u:4201_3: 3 nena / bādhapratirodhāntarbhāvāpatteḥ / nāpi karaṇavighaṭa 4 nena / tathātve vyāptipakṣadharmatānyatara-
GSP29vytrkt3u:4203_0: nanvastvito 'nya 5 traiva kaścana prakāra ityata āha -- na ca hetvābhāsa 6 tva iti //

GSP29vytrkt3u:4210: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe -- asiddhiravyāpti 1 śca hetuvirodha iti//
